Hello!
Thanks for visiting.

My name is Jenny Rhee, and I am an aspiring data scientist based in Lafayette, LA. I was originally pursuing marine biology, but discovered my love for data and programming during a summer internship in 2017.

I am really excited about data science in general, but I hope to one day have the opportunity to use data science to solve problems involving renewable energy and climate policy. I would also love to be involved in projects involving social good/improving the life of others. Besides that, I enjoy coffee, food, yoga, hiking, traveling (especially if it involves trying new coffee and food), and my dog Watson. Feel free to reach out!
